title: The 2016 ranked season is now live!

replies.body: LET'S GET READY TO {{champion:68}} !!!
It's funny cause that's copyrighted.
*trademarked :)
Get ready boys I'm coming for you {{champion:44}}
{{champion:81}} time to git our hands dirty
anybody readin' this in their voices?
{{champion:45}} Is that a short joke?!
so is this gonna be like last season where i won 8/10 placement games and get placed in bronze 4?

Your placement is based on how you did in previous seasons. ie if you were silver 3 you will probably end up anywhere frome bronze to silver 1. The more games you win the higher chance you get placed at the higher end of this

not true
I was silver 4 last season, went 7/3 got places bronze 3

lol last season i won 3/10 got silver 5. climbed to silver 1 in a week. this season i was 5-5 got placed in bronze 2. They have nothing to do with last season this time. or i wouldn't be living the bronze lyfe again
Because last ss u ended up with bronze 5, that why u won 8/10 u get bronze 4.
What about if we lose a ton of games due to afk teammates and intentional feeders? I feel like this happens in a majority of my placement games.
You obviously did not sacrifice enough first born cattle to the RNG gods.

so win 7/10 placements, get bronze 5, 3 losses due to afk's trolls, and people expect you to accept that because your mmr is higher than your average for your league, you can still climb... they fail to point out your mmr is capped at 10% higher then the average for your 'league' and that no matter what if you have the unfortunate luck to be stuck with the trolls, afks, and leavers that still are allowed access to ranked after countless times of being reported for these types of abuse.  Is supposed to not get at least a little salty about their luck, considering the same people that will preach 'you can climb' typically will not have the same string of luck resulting in over 250 ally deaths in 3 games, yes a total of 250 ally deaths in 3 games....  placements are a joke, please just put everyone at B5 and ban out the troll accounts from ranked, 7 years is to much for the community to continue to accept this.
I wish I could upvote this more than once. People think it's so easy to climb up. As a support main, I think it's the opposite for sure.

I know right? but i think its a more wide spread problem, my self and just about all 30 or so people on my Friends list finished 7/10 or better with placements, and yet, we all end up B4/5? wtf is going on, last 2 years that was good enough for silver4/5
Chroma skins aren't available in the dynamic queue champ select.
{{champion:99}} Light em up :3

Again, Thanks ALOT!!!

SO I went 7/3 in placements and got bronze v wtf is wrong with the ranked systems?
Your ranked system makes me want to quit.
i was silver 3 won 7/10 promo matches now im bronze ******* rito.
RIOT U NEED TO FIX YOUR GOD AWFUL RANKING SYSTEM TO PUT A GOLD PLAYER IN BRONZE 5 IS JUST STUPID AS FUCK

So....the new queue system isn't fully tested or deployed yet, the new mastery system isn't balanced or ready yet (THUNDERLORD'S DECREE EVERYWHERE BECAUSE ITS LITERALLY THE BEST FOR ALMOST EVERYONE) and the Marksmen Update isn't even fully finalized but to hell with it, let's launch anyway!

Riot, you astound me sometimes.

Im upset with this ranking system. I was in b3 almost into b2, and here comes placements. I get the usual in my ten placement matches, going 5/5. Now, Im back in b5, right back at square one. Mind you, I have, or had more then 200 wins in that league alone, still could not get out. This sort of thing makes me disinclined to play LoL.

Soft reset my ass! Seen people in gold 2 drop to silver 4 or worse! Hell Diamond players are dropping to low gold. Heavily influenced??? Do I need to get a dictionary for you Riot? I know you can only get to 
Plat 1 from promos but to drop a WHOLE level or more is more than a soft reset.
Yay its live... 1st game i get  guys who played last time half year ago and they decides to try rankeds... then they say i havent played years guys ! what u expect !. thts NA for you..
Great sample size!
Riot has officially open the gates to hell ... let the rank games begin {{champion:74}}
Hooray, time to get out of Wood Division V {{champion:57}}  {{summoner:31}}

this placement has been bs.  riot needs to fix this shit.  my wife climbed to silver 2 before the season and went 5/5 and place bronze 1.  i was a high point bronze 1 and went 5/5 got bronze 4.   this is the kind of stuff that makes people quit playing cause ranked is just a never end elo hell vortex

When is the new system going to be fixed? everyone is even MORE ridiculous about who goes where now that the new queue was taken away. there's people fighting over where they're going even in the game! it's almost impossible to play with people because of how immature they are. I would like it very much if it was updated immediately.

Finish the season at **Bronze 3**
Go **9-1** in placements after practicing
**Bronze 5**.
Thank you

pls answer why i win 9 and lose only 1, and i get bronze 5
this is stupid riot
Went 5-5. Got placed in b5. good times.
Same, good times.

So... Riot people. I want to understand how I go from Plat 4 to Gold 4 when I've won 8/10 of my games. No duos, I've been consistently been playing with Plat S5 people with plat/dia borders. Can anyone tell me what this is? Do they just want me to waste my time getting back up to Plat again?
I can finally have people to tell me to get cancer and/or Aids for having a bad game. The way LoL is suppose to be

Just a quick tip/note for you guys if you're concerned about maining a position: if you at least duo queue, you and your partner can select the same two positions. That way, even if you get your partner's position you can just trade out.

Example: I queue bot/support and my partner goes support/bot. If I get support then he lands bot, and we just let our team know, "Hey, we're duo so we're trading spots. I'm not actually trying to adc Sona"

Edit: Note that this works for any two positions, not just the bot lane duo. All you have to do is share the same two positions in queue with your duo.

It won't let you start the queue if you do that. You always need to cover one more position than the number of players to start (except for a 5 man queue, where you each just pick one position).

To guarantee that you get two positions you want, you need to queue with at least 3 people.
*i went 2/10 last season but only died about 4 times, and had more than 50 kills, so I secretly believe it's how you do in the game that mostly matters, but idk

I can verify that all that matters is your wins and loses.My brother and I would only duo queue during season 3, so we had the same rank at all times that season and we got placed at the same rank and gained the same lp. So make sure you always play for the W and not for the stats.

RIOT PLEASE FIX RANKED , I WAS SILVER 5 LAST SEASON I WENT 5-5 THIS SEASON AND NOW IM BRONZE 4 . WTF IS GOING ON!!!! WHY U SO LIGHT ON NEW PLAYERS, RITO PLSSS , THIS SHOULD BE LIKE SEASON 4 SYSTEM , PLAZ MAKE IT MORE FAIR FOR SOME PEOPLE. I HAD TO CLIMB FROM B4 TO S5 LAST SEASON , NOW IM BACK WHERE I STARTED , SO PLEEEEAAASEEEE MAKE THE SYSTEM BETTER{{champion:32}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
im pretty sure this is the reason many quit the game

Riot please fix these ranked placements. I went 7/10 in placement and got bronze 5. A lot of people will say it is because I got carried, but on all of my games I did pretty darn good, even the ones we lost. I went 7/1/8 blitz win, 6/9/16 blitz loss, 8/5/4 darius win, 4/2/19 win, 12/2/2 heim win, 2/7/10 blitz loss, 10/2/5 teemo win, 3/4/2 blitz loss, 4/3/4 darius win, 3/2/16 blitz win. These are not bronze 5 stats. Also I didn't just play one champ yes blitz was played a lot, but I play other champs and kicked butt. Please look into this problem. On top of my problems three other people in my game had the same problem. One was 7/10 and got bronze 5 and the other was 9/10 and got bronze 5. Riot please fix this.  Almost all ranked players are having this problem.

riot needs to address AFK's in Provisionals... far too many times players are screwed over because of AFK in beginning or during match. it is unfair to placements and virtually a pointless match... yes 4v5 can be won. but rarely does that happen. just a point needed to be addressed
